wikipedia_page.main: Christopher John Birch (born 1984) is a Welsh business consultant who reportedly underwent personality changes and a change in sexual orientation following a stroke in 2005 when he was 20.Birch has given TV interviews about his stroke on The Saturday Night Show, Doctors and Filip and Fredrik in 2011, as well as A Totally Different Me and Sunday Night in 2012.Totally Different Me is a BBC documentary about Birch's life before and after the accident and how he began to cope with his new life. The documentary aired in April 2012. Vice also published a follow-up interview with Birch in 2017 in which he criticised how the media had portrayed his experience.

response: * Chris Birch, Welsh rugby player, self-described gay convert
* Chris Birch (politician) (1950–2019), member of the Alaska Senate
